mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, phone AS phone, advisory_telephont AS advisoryTelephone, hotel_name AS hotelName, receive_time AS receiveTime, return_time AS returnTime, room_num AS roomNum, address AS address, picture_num AS pictureNum, logitude AS logitude, latiude AS latiude, remark1 AS remark1, remark2 AS remark2, remark3 AS remark3, remark4 AS remark4, status AS status FROM hotel_list WHERE effective = '1'
